publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-2091 Brian Adam: Market Measures and Welfare Disposal Scheme for Lambs and Ewes—That the Parliament urges the Scottish Executive to implement market measures, including a welfare disposal scheme, for lambs and ewes.
S1M-2091 Market Measures and Welfare Disposal Scheme for Lambs and Ewes (lodged on 26 July 2001) Mr Adam Ingram*, Mr Gil Paterson*, Mr Lloyd Quinan*, Fergus Ewing*, Christine Grahame*
S1M-2091 Market Measures and Welfare Disposal Scheme for Lambs and Ewes (lodged on 26 July 2001) Dorothy-Grace Elder*

S1M-2091 Brian Adam: Market Measures and Welfare Disposal Scheme for Lambs and Ewes—That the Parliament urges the Scottish Executive to implement market measures, including a welfare disposal scheme, for lambs and ewes. Supported by: Mr Adam Ingram, Mr Gil Paterson, Mr Lloyd Quinan, Fergus Ewing, Christine Grahame, Dorothy-Grace Elder, Robin Harper, Michael Russell

S1M-2091 Brian Adam: Market Measures and Welfare Disposal Scheme for Lambs and Ewes-That the Parliament urges the Scottish Executive to implement market measures, including a welfare disposal scheme, for lambs and ewes. Supported by: Mr Adam Ingram, Mr Gil Paterson, Mr Lloyd Quinan, Fergus Ewing, Christine Grahame, Dorothy-Grace Elder, Robin Harper, Michael Russell

S1M-2091 Brian Adam: Market Measures and Welfare Disposal Scheme for Lambs and Ewes—That the Parliament urges the Scottish Executive to implement market measures, including a welfare disposal scheme, for lambs and ewes. Supported by: Mr Adam Ingram, Mr Gil Paterson, Mr Lloyd Quinan, Fergus Ewing, Christine Grahame, Dorothy-Grace Elder, Robin Harper, Michael Russell

S1M-2091 Brian Adam: Market Measures and Welfare Disposal Scheme for Lambs and Ewes-That the Parliament urges the Scottish Executive to implement market measures, including a welfare disposal scheme, for lambs and ewes. Supported by: Mr Adam Ingram, Mr Gil Paterson, Mr Lloyd Quinan, Fergus Ewing, Christine Grahame, Dorothy-Grace Elder, Robin Harper, Michael Russell
S1M-2091 Market Measures and Welfare Disposal Scheme for Lambs and Ewes (lodged on 26 July 2001) Roseanna Cunningham*

S1M-2091 Brian Adam: Market Measures and Welfare Disposal Scheme for Lambs and Ewes-That the Parliament urges the Scottish Executive to implement market measures, including a welfare disposal scheme, for lambs and ewes. Supported by: Mr Adam Ingram, Mr Gil Paterson, Mr Lloyd Quinan, Fergus Ewing, Christine Grahame, Dorothy-Grace Elder, Robin Harper, Michael Russell, Roseanna Cunningham
